text: Destined to be Yours is a Philippine romantic-comedy and drama television series starring Alden Richards and Maine Mendoza, also known as the AlDub love team. The series premiered on GMA Network's GMA Telebabad evening block and also aired worldwide through GMA Pinoy TV on February 27, 2017, replacing first season of Alyas Robin Hood. It also has 24-hour catch-up episodes via HOOQ. The very first prime time television series of AlDub follows the story of star-crossed lovers Sinag (Mendoza) and Benjie (Richards). NUTAM (Nationwide Urban Television Audience Measurement) ratings are provided by AGB Nielsen Philippines while Kantar Media Philippines provide Nationwide ratings (Urban + Rural). The series ended its 13-week run on May 26, 2017, with a total of 63 episodes.
